message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation. I would like to propose a price of $8000 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I can meet you in the middle, though. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I've given this some thought, and I'd like to counter with a price of $9500 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.

I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still think I can get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you at $9800, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think about other interested buyers, so I'd like to make a deal with you soon.

I appreciate your effort in adjusting the price, Alice. Considering the value and condition of the product, I would like to propose a price of $9600. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I'm getting close to your price, Bob, but I still think I can get a bit more. I'm willing to meet you at $9700, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to get a little concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, and I may need to consider other options.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $9650 for the product. I hope this proposal will lead to a successful conclusion of our negotiations.

I've given you a lot of flexibility, Bob, and I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $9700 one last time, but if I don't get a serious offer, I'll be forced to explore other options. This is my final counteroffer.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. After weighing all the factors, I am prepared to offer a final price of $9675 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise and I hope it will facilitate a satisfactory conclusion to our negotiations.
